  • Constructor Details

    • ObjectiveDeck

      public ObjectiveDeck()
      Constructs an ObjectiveDeck initializing it with the default number of objective cards. It also initializes the deck by reading JSON files containing card data.

  • Method Details

    • getFrontCards

      public ArrayList<ObjectiveCard> getFrontCards()
      Retrieves the list of objective cards currently in the front of the deck.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of ObjectiveCard objects representing the front cards.

    • initializeDeck

      public void initializeDeck()
      Initializes the deck of objective cards by reading from JSON files. Reads the front cards from a JSON file and populates the frontCards list. Handles various exceptions that may occur during file reading or JSON parsing.

    • checkEndDeck

      public boolean checkEndDeck()
      Checks if the deck of objective cards has ended.
      Returns:
      {true} if the deck has ended (no more cards are available), {false} otherwise.

    • returnCard

      public ObjectiveCard returnCard() throws DeckEmptyException
      Returns a random objective card from the deck. The method selects a random card from the deck, decreases the number of cards in the deck, and removes the selected card from the deck.
      Returns:
      the randomly selected objective card.
      Throws:
      DeckEmptyException

    • getNumCards

      public int getNumCards()
      Retrieves the number of objective cards remaining in the deck.
      Returns:
      the number of cards remaining in the objective card deck.
